message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"family members; the people in a family","sentence":"家人爱我。","image_prompt":"In a soft apocalypse animation style, depict a simple, warm family scene: a group of people (parents, children, and perhaps a grandparent) standing together in front of a home, expressing affection for each other. Subtle hints of a gentle, dreamy post-apocalyptic background: overgrown plants, soft sunlight, and comforting, hopeful expressions, but with no danger or sadness. The mood is peaceful, focusing on family unity despite the softened background.","sentence_translation":"My family loves me."}
